I had been to True Blue before for breakfast and for sundowner drinks and was very impressed with the service and the quality and presentation of food and drinks.  Therefore my friend and I decided to sample the 7 course Christmas Dinner on Christmas Eve...and it was absolutely wonderful! 

They have set up the tables at quite a distance from each other,  so that it  felt safe to dine there and we chose outdoor seating, although some diners favoured the tables inside. The set menu was very well thought out and offered so many dishes and tidbits that expats hanker after in Sri Lanka.  There was no vegetarian option, which might be something to introduce for future set dinners, but I am definitely looking forward to the next festive occasion!  The portions were just right and the timing of the menu was impeccable, making for a very enjoyable 3 hours of fine dining. 
The antipasto platter was a delight, followed by a sumptuous salad with smoked salmon, quail eggs, apples and walnuts.  The third course was a very tasty turkey and rosemary skewer, with a delicious and rich sweet potato and butternut squash soup. 
As a palate cleanser they offered a very christmassy and refreshing cranberry sorbet, before the main course, which was a choice of lamb with asparagus and mint sauce or Herb crusted sea bass.  Both were very moreish indeed.   The main dish was followed by 2 courses of dessert, much to our delight, as we both have a rather pronounced sweet tooth: a season.appropriate gingerbread souffle with apple sorbet and petit fours with chocolates.  
It really was fine dining at its best and gave any high-end European restaurant a run for its money. I will definitely be coming back to True Blue for breakfasts, lunches  and dinners and  - course - for sundowners in the rooftop bar.
